room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: First time here, tried out the "Arizona Shootout". Lot's of fun, great staff, and just a good experience.  We are back the next day to try out "Mansion Murder". Definitely making this a regular spot to hit when we are in town.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: The Mystery Mansion was the most difficult room that I've ever played but very fun. Great staff.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: My wife and I have done 13 escape rooms from east coast to west coast. I can honestly say the Mansion Murder lived up to the hype and was the hardest and one of the most fun and exciting we have done! We escaped with 4 minutes to spare! These guys are knowledgeable and really know how to show you a good time!
